overview: My German friend, Hakan comes to stay with me for a while to get a little taste of America. In Europe, he is known as the second cumming of Rocco and word of his prowess has obviously spread to the U.S., as you will see! All I can say is between Taren and Missy and Lovett and Markie, Hakan gorged himself on good ol'American Tushy! Enjoy!
title: American Tushy
